mod.name: HololiveMod
mod.description:
REME`s mod.If you have a nice time,I will be happy.:) 
 增加了一个新的人物：Hololive。可以召唤成员进行攻击，并且她们会代替你受伤。卡牌之间有意想不到的配合效果。
 图片素材来源于网络
 杀戮尖塔mod交流群：723677239

relics.name: Hololive
relics.description:
At the start of each combat,if you have any combination, choose an ability.
for every 4 combinations you have, the number of ability choices increases once.

relics.name: Fried Shrimp Lion
relics.description: At the start of each combat,gain 1 Matsuri if you don`t have.Draw 1 card each time Matsuri Hurt.

relics.name: Light Stick
relics.description: At the start of each combat,gain 1 orb slots if you don`t have,then randomly summon a vtuber with her StartLive triggered.

relics.name: Not Today
relics.description: Your vtubers Cant deal damage when attack.

relics.name: One Syo-Jyo Army
relics.description: At the start of each combat,summon Aqua ,reduce max slots to 1.If you control no vtubers,summon Aqua every 3 turns.

relics.name: Top Up Your Money
relics.description:
You cant get card rewards any more.
 Right Click this:Add a random card to your hand.It will cost 10 Gold .

relics.name: Yagoo Big Family
relics.description: Start game with 4 special Yagoo Big Family .
relics.flavorText: As you sow, so shall you reap..what`s this?

relics.name: Finger
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.Every 5 turns,add a random @rcurse card to your draw pile.

relics.name: Top Up Your Money
relics.description:
You cant get card rewards any more.
 Right Click this:Add a random card to your hand.It will cost 20 Gold .

keywords.name: Choose
keywords.description: Choose from some cards and trigger something.

keywords.name: Combination
keywords.description: When you have specific cards in your master deck,trigger something.

keywords.name: Combination:BlondHair
keywords.description: AkaiHaato + AkiRosenthal + YuzukiChoco + YzoraMel + TsunomakiWatame + ShiranuiFlare

keywords.name: DurableLive
keywords.description: At the end of your turn,give +1 health to all vtubers.

keywords.name: Hunted
keywords.description: At the end of turn,receive 5 damage for each debuff you have.

keywords.name: Magic
keywords.description: Choose and enhanced when you control Shion.Cant be affected by Aki.

keywords.name: Program
keywords.description: Exhaust when drawn,and draw 1 card if draw pile is not empty.

keywords.name: Taunt
keywords.description: Vtubers with taunt receive damage first.

keywords.name: Vtuber
keywords.description: Vtubers will attack at the end of your turn,and take damage for you.
